Cognii | Boston, MA | Remote OK

Cognii is transforming online education with AI based Virtual Assistant(chatbot) technology. Winner of the best learning assessment innovation of 2015, we are adding a few key positions to meet the growing demand:

1. AI Technology Director

  - natural language processing
  - statistical machine learning
  - syntactic and semantic analysis
  - information extraction
2. Computational Linguist/NLP Engineer

  - Linguistically process text corpora
  - Regular expressions
  - Design human-machine interactions
3. Engineering/Product Manager

  - Design, implement, deploy, manage the web platform for interactive learning
  - Experience with Ruby on Rails based scalable architecture
EdTech experience is a plus. Compensation includes significant amount of equity. Please send your resume and queries to jobs@cognii.com
